params.titleId: id of the title of which the deed is a fraction

authorizeWallet(address).details: add recipient addresses to the authorized wallets list and grant them the ability to mint

deauthorizeWallet(address).details: remove recipient addresses to the authorized wallets list and revoke their ability to mint

exists(uint256).details: returns true or false if the deed exists in the contract

params.deedId: deed token id to check for

fulfillTitleOwnershipVerification(bytes3.details: Receive the response and store it in a mapping to track verified titles

params._fractionalization: amount of fractions allowed to mint (Max 52)
params._verified: boolean which determines whether the title has been verified by external sources
params.requestId: identifier of original request; used for finding titleId

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.data: additional data in case the minter is a contract*
params.from: address string to send the tokens from
params.to: address string to send the tokens to

setMarketplaceContract(address).details: sets marketplace smart contract address to restrict functions to this contract only

setTitleSearchURI(string).details: sets title search uri for title verification

setTokenURI(string).details: sets base uri for all deeds

uri(uint256).details: returns the metadata uri for a given deedId

params.deedId: the deedId id to return metadata for

returns._0: uri string of the deedId metadata

verifyTitleOwnership(bytes32).details: Makes an API call to our in house title search API which will have information on the title and it's whether it's been marked as verified.

params.titleId: The primary identifier for performing title searches

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

constructor.notice: Initialize the link token and target oracle Kovan Testnet details: Link Token: 0xa36085F69e2889c224210F603D836748e7dC0088 Oracle: 0x094C858cF9428a4c18023AA714d3e205b6Db6354 (Oracle Kovan Address) jobId: b107506bb152402dac00444a6da79d44

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.
